data.actual_result: The picture rotates to a random direction
data.expected_result: The picture needs to be stright
data.short_description: Rotated profile pic when uploading in 4:3 on LGG5
data.steps_to_repro: - have a LG G5 - go to your camera and take a picture in portrait mode in 4:3(not landscape, not 16:9) - try uploading it as profile picture on discord -
